      • readFully

        public static java.lang.String readFully(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                         java.lang.String encoding)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Reads all texts from a stream using a specific encoding.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - inputStream to read from.
        encoding - Encoding used to read input stream. (Default is UTF-8).
        Returns:
        String read from the given input stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Input output exception.

      • readFully

        Parameters:
        inputStream - inputStream to read from.
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • writeFully

              java.lang.String text,
              java.lang.String encoding)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Write some text string into an output stream using a specific encoding
        Parameters:
        outputStream - Stream to write into
        text - Text to write
        encoding - Encoding used to write data. (Default is UTF-8).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Returns:

      • formatTimeSpan

        public static java.lang.String formatTimeSpan(long time)
        Format a span of time. It will take some time interval and return day/hour/minute in that interval.
        Parameters:
        time - long time interval
        Returns:
        Formatted time interval
